name: Robo Blocks
description:
Robo Blocks is a unique new puzzle game with a twist. Destroy groups of coloured blocks by rotating your phone/ipad to clear levels within the time limit. Use a combination of speed and tactics to find the best ways of solving levels, and be rewarded with new special features.

Different levels require different techniques to complete them so you can learn to become the ultimate Robo Blocker.

• Over 60 fun levels available with more being added all the time.
• Each level brings new challenges like shorter time limits, more colours and less lives.
• Special blocks are introduced every few levels to keep game play fresh and interesting. These include Bombs, Mini Blocks, as well as Armoured and Stealth Blocks.
• Compete with others using Game Center to see who can complete the most challenges

*****
This game has surprising depth. The first levels are easy enough to get you hooked but get very challenging later - can take some serious thought to complete!

*****
Love the special blocks, especially the Mini Blocks. They completely change the game play! I can't wait to see what new blocks are introduced with the new levels!
